categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: Bultz was a group of two stormtrooper transports used by the Rebel Alliance during the Galactic Civil War.

The transports attempted to fight back against an Imperial attack consisting of TIE Interceptors and TIE Bombers on a supply depot, which included shuttles Revt, Y-wings and X-wings but were destroyed in the battle along with the space depot, including a Container transport Moth. The battle was recorded and adapted into the Combat chamber to train future pilots, one of which was Maarek Stele.
